00018 BehaviorCombo::BehaviorCombo (const NiTPointerList<BehaviorPtr>& behaviors, 
00019                                                            const NiTPointerList<float>& coefficients)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
00020 {
00021         CopyLists(behaviors, m_lBehaviors);
00022         CopyLists(coefficients, m_lCoefficients);
00023 }
00024 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 BehaviorCombo::~BehaviorCombo()
00030 {
00031         m_lBehaviors.RemoveAll();       
00032         m_lCoefficients.RemoveAll();    
00033 }
00034 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00042 NxVec3 BehaviorCombo::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00043 {
00044         // check if one of the behavior or coefficient lists is empty
00045         if (m_lBehaviors.IsEmpty() || m_lCoefficients.IsEmpty()) 
00046         {
00047                 return 0;
00048         }
00049 
00050         // iterate through the behaviors and respective coefficients
00051         NxVec3 desiredVel = NxVec3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00052         NiTListIterator behaviorIter = m_lBehaviors.GetHeadPos();
00053         NiTListIterator coefIter = m_lCoefficients.GetHeadPos();
00054         
00055         int size = m_lBehaviors.GetSize() > m_lCoefficients.GetSize() ? m_lCoefficients.GetSize() :
00056                                                                                                                                         m_lBehaviors.GetSize();
00057         for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00058         {
00059                 // increase the desired velocity by executing each of the
00060                 // behaviors and getting the desired velocity that each one of
00061                 // them generates. The velocity of each behavior is multiplied
00062                 // with a coefficient
00063                 BehaviorPtr behavior = m_lBehaviors.Get(behaviorIter);
00064                 float coefficient = m_lCoefficients.Get(coefIter);
00065                 desiredVel += coefficient * behavior->Execute(aInfo);   
00066                 behaviorIter = m_lBehaviors.GetNextPos(behaviorIter);
00067                 coefIter = m_lCoefficients.GetNextPos(coefIter);
00068         }
00069 
00070         // set desired velocity and orientation
00071         aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = desiredVel;
00072         aInfo->m_vOrientation = aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00073         aInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00074         if (aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity.magnitude() > aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity)
00075                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vOrientation * aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00076         
00077         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00078         
00079 }
